title: tfw you're a jungler and your team is wrecking without you

replies.body: I've never had the pleasure of experiencing this, what is it like?

*Gets dragon or an assist*

"Guys...  GUYS!!!!  I did something"

Rare honestly for me.  Each time I play jungle 2 mins into game every lane is pinging for "help" and dies over and over again.  
I hate jungle because you have to rely on 4 randoms that suck to at least not die 30 times before you can finish an item.

i actually saw a top lane pantheon in my last game or previous

he shit on this poor riven so fucking hard and roamed and shit on everyone else

i felt by for the riven she had like 50 cs when pantheon had well over 130 or something

> [{quoted}](name=A Basic Island,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Ol5iBz2b,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2017-01-31T23:39:16.792+0000)
>
> i actually saw a top lane pantheon in my last game or previous
> 
> he shit on this poor riven so fucking hard and roamed and shit on everyone else
> 
> i felt by for the riven she had like 50 cs when pantheon had well over 130 or something

You shouldn't feel for the Riven, being beat that bad by Pantheon is outright embarrassing.

This is most of my jungle games, luckily enough XD

That is why I like Shyvana jungle, I can just sit in my jungle and farm all day, and when I run out of mobs to farm I can just go to the enemy jungle for a bit. Kill dragon after first B. Team is still shoved and are picking up kills.

Man, I should jungle more often.
